data_needed: Location GPS; formal or informal status; license status; drug categories; brand and SKU; price; stock and stockout; supplier source; aggregation point; sales method
companies_to_contact: Ministry of Health; Pharmacy Council; WHO; UNICEF; MSF; local pharma distributors; pharma manufacturers
actors_from_source_to_consumer: Manufacturer or importer -> national wholesaler -> regional distributor -> pharmacy or drug vendor -> patient
products_or_services: Prescription drugs; OTC drugs; vitamins; diagnostics; consumables
likely_problems: Counterfeit risk; stockouts; compliance issues; cold chain gaps; price volatility
data_gaps: Informal outlet coverage gaps; real time stock visibility; batch and expiry traceability
how_to_find_deltas: Revisit weekly with photo GPS timestamp evidence; compare openings closures SKU changes supplier changes and price changes

data_needed: Kiosk location; operator brand; float availability; cash in and cash out volume proxy; fees; service uptime; agent identity
companies_to_contact: MTN Mobile Money; Orange Money; telecom regulators; agent network managers; fintech aggregators
actors_from_source_to_consumer: Telecom or fintech principal -> super agent -> field agent kiosk -> consumer
products_or_services: Cash in cash out; bill pay; transfers; airtime
likely_problems: Liquidity shortages; fraud; downtime; unsafe cash handling
data_gaps: Agent level transaction time series; true liquidity by hour; failed transaction logs
how_to_find_deltas: Track same agents daily; detect new or closed agents liquidity shifts fee changes downtime spikes

data_needed: Station location; fuel type availability; pump prices; queue proxy; stock status; delivery schedule; operator
companies_to_contact: TotalEnergies; OLA Energy; Tradex; Neptune Oil; national downstream regulator; depot operators
actors_from_source_to_consumer: Refinery or importer -> depot -> transporter -> station operator -> driver or household
products_or_services: Petrol; diesel; lubricants; LPG where available
likely_problems: Stockouts; adulteration; theft; sudden price changes
data_gaps: Live stock levels; delivery delay attribution; nozzle level sales
how_to_find_deltas: Daily price and availability checks; detect stockout events price jumps and supplier route changes

data_needed: Outlet location and type; license status; brands and SKU; prices; promotions; stock; supplier
companies_to_contact: Breweries and distillers; distributors; municipal licensing office; retail associations
actors_from_source_to_consumer: Producer or importer -> distributor -> wholesaler -> outlet -> consumer
likely_problems: Informal sales; tax leakage; counterfeit bottles; unstable supply
data_gaps: Informal channel map; outlet level sales velocity; reliable promo history
how_to_find_deltas: Weekly outlet panel and photo evidence; detect brand entry exit price and promo delta

data_needed: Kiosk location; kiosk type; owner profile; product list; prices; stock depth; restock frequency
companies_to_contact: FMCG distributors; kiosk unions; telecoms; mobile money providers; wholesalers
actors_from_source_to_consumer: Manufacturer -> wholesaler -> sub distributor -> kiosk -> consumer
products_or_services: Snacks; drinks; toiletries; airtime; basic household goods
likely_problems: Low working capital; frequent stockouts; fragmented supply
data_gaps: Inventory depth by day; supplier replacement logs; margin data
how_to_find_deltas: Same kiosk revisit cycles; detect SKU churn stockout pattern and supplier shifts

data_needed: Hub location; route map; traffic proxy by time band; vendor mix; service levels
companies_to_contact: City transport authority; transport unions; bus and taxi operators; route associations
actors_from_source_to_consumer: Regulator -> operator and union -> drivers and conductors -> station vendors -> passengers
products_or_services: Transport services; ticketing; parcel services; adjacent retail
likely_problems: Congestion; informal fees; safety incidents; schedule volatility
data_gaps: Reliable passenger counts; route punctuality series; incident details
how_to_find_deltas: Compare route activity and vendor mix snapshots; detect route launches drops and traffic shifts

data_needed: Billboard location; format and size; advertiser brand; campaign creative; start and end date; traffic proxy
companies_to_contact: JCDecaux where present; local OOH owners; media agencies; municipal permit office; major advertisers
actors_from_source_to_consumer: Brand -> media agency -> billboard owner -> installer -> audience
likely_problems: Permit non compliance; weak audience measurement; high creative churn
data_gaps: Verified impression estimates; campaign duration history; occupancy baseline
how_to_find_deltas: Photo monitor each panel; detect creative changes brand share of voice and occupancy delta

data_needed: High resolution imagery; building footprints; POI extraction; ground photos; structure use classification
companies_to_contact: Maxar or Airbus partners; national statistics office; municipalities; OSM communities
actors_from_source_to_consumer: Imagery provider -> analytics team -> field validators -> planning and commercial users
likely_problems: Cloud cover; validation lag; geocoding mismatches
data_gaps: Frequent ground truth labels; up to date informal settlement boundaries
how_to_find_deltas: Run image differencing then field audits; detect new removed repurposed structures and density changes

data_needed: Depot and station map; route coverage; fleet operator list; fuel price and stock; consumption proxy
companies_to_contact: Fuel marketers; fleet operators; logistics firms; telematics providers; transport unions
actors_from_source_to_consumer: Refinery or importer -> depot -> transporter -> station -> fleet operator -> end user
products_or_services: Fuel supply and fleet movement services
likely_problems: Leakage; route inefficiency; shortage risk; downtime
data_gaps: Route level fuel consumption; station level live stock; delay root cause data
how_to_find_deltas: Track price stock route and refill cadence; detect anomalies and supply disruption deltas

data_needed: Program location; service type; beneficiary counts; stock availability; partner map; delivery cadence
companies_to_contact: WHO; UNICEF; WFP; Red Cross; local NGOs and CBOs; donor programs
actors_from_source_to_consumer: Donor -> NGO HQ -> local implementing partner -> field team -> beneficiary
products_or_services: Health food education WASH protection services
likely_problems: Funding volatility; duplicate coverage; weak last mile reporting
data_gaps: Outcome level data by zone; overlap maps; service quality trend
how_to_find_deltas: Compare service footprint snapshots; detect coverage expansions reductions and stock gaps

data_needed: Outlet by channel; SKU and brand; pack size; price; promo; shelf share; stockouts; distributor coverage
companies_to_contact: Unilever; Nestle; Coca Cola; Heineken; Diageo; local FMCG distributors; modern trade chains
actors_from_source_to_consumer: Manufacturer -> national distributor -> wholesaler -> retailer and kiosk -> consumer
products_or_services: Food beverages home care personal care
likely_problems: Counterfeit goods; fragmented channels; promo inefficiency; stockouts
data_gaps: Outlet level sell out; informal channel share; promo lift by zone
how_to_find_deltas: Track SKU and price and promo deltas on fixed outlet panels

data_needed: Asset location; functionality status; uptime; usage proxy; incident logs; maintenance cycle
companies_to_contact: Municipalities; utilities; ministries; public service operators; development agencies
actors_from_source_to_consumer: Government or utility -> contractor or operator -> service point -> citizen
products_or_services: Water sanitation electricity clinics schools waste services
likely_problems: Downtime; maintenance backlog; uneven access; weak incident response
data_gaps: Asset condition history; true uptime; demand hotspot trends
how_to_find_deltas: Routine functionality audit snapshots; detect outage and restoration deltas

data_needed: Competitor coverage by vertical; refresh cadence; pricing model; client segments; methodology notes
companies_to_contact: Local market research firms; GIS data vendors; analytics startups; procurement teams at target clients
actors_from_source_to_consumer: Competitor producer -> reseller partner -> enterprise client -> business users
likely_problems: Opaque methods; stale updates; low local validation
data_gaps: Comparable quality benchmarks; adoption metrics; switching triggers
how_to_find_deltas: Monthly competitor scorecard; detect product pricing and coverage deltas
